about_the_game:
The Radical Rabbit Stew soundtrack features 17 'hare' raising hopping mad tracks composed exclusively for the game. This soundtrack was composed by the wonderfully prolific YERZMYEY in their signature chiptune 8bit pop!

Check out the full game for Radical Rabbit Stew Below!

name: Radical Rabbit Stew Soundtrack
short_description: This is additional content for Radical Rabbit Stew, but does not include the base game.
